RegisterForEvents Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node»GrowableFunction. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyEventDescription
Event Locks PanelGets or sets an array of Booleans where each element gets or sets whether an event item on the referenced Register For Events function locks the front panel when generated. LabVIEW ignores this property for non-UI events. Details
Event TypesGets or sets an array of event types. You can get or set one event type for each event item on the referenced Register For Events function. Details
